text: Amrapur is a small village in Jamnagar, Gujarat, India. The road to it is from Kalavad to Ranuja, Dhutarpur, Summary, Kharavedha, Amrapur. Amrapur is surrounded on three sides by a dam. Most people there are farmers. Some of them are connected with animal husbandry. Mr Vijaybhai Borsadiya is currently surpanch of the village‚Äç. ==Statistics== *Population (approx): 250 *Buildings (approx): 25 *Temples: 3 *Shops: 2 *Primary school: 1 ==Gallery== File:Hanuman temple amrapur.jpg|Hanuman temple amrapur File:Bapa sitaram oto amrapur.jpg|Bapa sitaram oto amrapur File:Shiv temple amrapur.jpg|Shiv temple amrapur ==Other websites== *The official Facebook page of village Category:Villages in Gujarat
